title: How to improve my writing speed in the UPSC Mains as I always tend to leave questions to which I even know answers due to the paucity of time - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: You need to practice writing everyday. Answer in the form of bullets only, covering all important points. Remember the exam is to test your knowledge, but not writing speed. In fact, they test your ability of fast reaction to each question, as you need to take immediate decisions on so many matters perfectly when you become Civil Servant. All the Best!

Set targets of less time to write questions which is actually being provided in upsc exam. Eg if you got 7 minutes to write 1 questions set you target of 5 minutes it will increase yours speed, and also first make short notes or some key points in rough it will make u fast during answer writing time
